text: Nim'ma sahodariyu nadedu hoguttiddalu mattu ake (phir‌aun‌nodane) ‘‘itanannu posisaballavarannu nanu nimage torisale?’’ Endu kelidalu. Hige navu matte nim'mannu nim'ma tayiyedege maralisidevu – akeya kannu tampagalendu hagu ake duhkhisadiralendu. Munde nivu obbana hatye nadesidiri. Aga navu nim'mannu sankatadinda parugolisidevu mattu nim'mannu navu halavu pariksegalige olapadisidevu. A balika nivu halavu varsa mad‌yan‌navara jote iddiri. Idiga o musa, nivu niscita samayadalle bandiruviri
